segment.source: In Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), as an AGPM Administrator (Full Control), you manage access to the archive and have the option to limit the number of versions of each Group Policy Object (GPO) stored in the archive.
segment.target: In Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), as an AGPM Administrator (Full Control), you manage access to the archive and have the option to limit the number of versions of each Group Policy Object (GPO) stored in the archive.

segment.source: You can delegate access to GPOs in the archive at the domain level or GPO level.
segment.target: You can delegate access to GPOs in the archive at the domain level or GPO level.

segment.source: Additionally, you can back up the archive so that you may be able to recover it if a disaster occurs.
segment.target: Additionally, you can back up the archive so that you may be able to recover it if a disaster occurs.

segment.source: As an AGPM Administrator, you can export a GPO to a file, copy the file to another forest, and then import the GPO into a domain in that forest.
segment.target: As an AGPM Administrator, you can export a GPO to a file, copy the file to another forest, and then import the GPO into a domain in that forest.

segment.source: Unlike an Editor, you can import policy settings from a GPO backup directly into a new controlled GPO when you create it.
segment.target: Unlike an Editor, you can import policy settings from a GPO backup directly into a new controlled GPO when you create it.

segment.source: For information about how to export a GPO, see Export a GPO to a File.
segment.target: For information about how to export a GPO, see Export a GPO to a File.

segment.source: Delegate Domain-Level Access to the Archive
segment.target: Delegate Domain-Level Access to the Archive

segment.source: Delegate Access to an Individual GPO in the Archive
segment.target: Delegate Access to an Individual GPO in the Archive

segment.source: Import a GPO from a File
segment.target: Import a GPO from a File

segment.source: Restore the Archive from a Backup
segment.target: Restore the Archive from a Backup

segment.source: For information about how to delegate access to GPOs in the production environment, see Delegate Access to the Production Environment.
segment.target: For information about how to delegate access to GPOs in the production environment, see Delegate Access to the Production Environment.

segment.source: For information about how to move the archive, see Move the AGPM Server and the Archive.
segment.target: For information about how to move the archive, see Move the AGPM Server and the Archive.
